T02D1391:23a-1: badzra p'a da garbta [*garbha] sam gra ha n'a ma panytsi k'a /
T02D1391:23a-3: rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel /
T02D1391:23a-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal dgyes mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1391:23a-5: rdo rje de nyid rab rtogs pa //
T02D1391:23a-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa mchog /'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid mgon //
T02D1391:23a-7: dpal ldan bla mar bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1391:23a-8: sgyu ma lta sogs dpe yis ni //
T02D1391:23a-9: rang bzhin gang zhig rtogs par bya //
T02D1391:23a-10: de ni ma lus bsgoms pa yi //
T02D1391:23a-11: phyag rgya chen por bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1391:23a-12: smin mtshams rdo rje rin chen mthar //
T02D1391:23a-13: dga' ba la sogs rab tu gang //
T02D1391:23a-14: gang mtha' skyes pa gang gyur pa //
T02D1391:23a-15: lha mo de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1391:23a-16: 'dir re zhig dpal ldan dang po mchog gi sangs rgyas rgyud kyi rim pa dang /
T02D1391:23a-17: rdo rje snying po la sogs dpal ldan phyag na
T02D1391:23a-18: rdo rje'i gsung rab dang rgyud phan tshun legs par
T02D1391:23a-19: gsungs pa ma lus pa nye bar bsdus te /
T02D1391:23a-20: phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang sbyin sreg
T02D1391:23a-21: dang las kyi tshogs la sogs pa rgya che ba
T02D1391:23a-22: zab cing rtogs par dka' bas skrag pa dag lung
T02D1391:23a-24: cung zad cig yang dag par bsdus te dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i /
T02D1391:23a-25: rdo rje'i tshig nges par bya ba ni /
T02D1391:23a-26: bla ma dam pa dag las thob cing man ngag
T02D1391:23a-27: gi rim pa rnyed pas na rang nyid dran par
T02D1391:23a-28: bya ba dang / slob ma rnams kyis rtogs par
T02D1391:23a-29: bya ba'i phyir yang dag par bzung ste bri bar
T02D1391:23a-30: bya ba dang / bya'o // da ni sbyor ba
T02D1391:23a-31: yan lag drug bsgom pa zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1391:23a-32: 'di'i don rgyud phan tshun nas rtogs par bya ba
T02D1391:23a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1391:23a-34: de bzhin du rgyud gzhan dag nas kyang gsungs pa
T02D1391:23a-35: des sbyor ba'i yan lag drug po 'di nyid bsgom
T02D1391:23a-36: par bya ste / so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang //
T02D1391:23a-37: srog rtsol dang ni 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1391:23a-38: rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin rnams //
T02D1391:23a-39: sbyor ba'i yan lag drug tu 'dod //
T02D1391:23a-40: 'dir so sor sdud pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1391:23a-41: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po dang /
T02D1391:23a-42: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams
T02D1391:23b-0: phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i @23b yul la
T02D1391:23b-1: mi 'jug cing / mchog tu gyur pa'i mig la sogs pa'i dbang po dang /
T02D1391:23b-2: mchog tu gyur pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams /
T02D1391:23b-3: nang gi bdag nyid kyi yul la rab tu 'jug pa zhes pa ste /
T02D1391:23b-4: nang gi bdag nyid ni stong pa nyid la dmigs
T02D1391:23b-5: pas dngos po thams cad rtog pa med par gzigs
T02D1391:23b-6: pa gzhon nu ma la me long bstan pa lta
T02D1391:23b-7: bu stong pa nyid so sor snang ba 'di ni
T02D1391:23b-8: khams gsum rnams sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan so sor
T02D1391:23b-9: mthong bas na so sor sdud pa'i yan lag ces
T02D1391:23b-10: brjod do // de nas bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1391:23b-11: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong ba yin la /
T02D1391:23b-13: de la sems rab tu zhugs pa'o //
T02D1391:23b-16: rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1391:23b-17: dngos po de nyid kyi don rab tu dpyod pa'o //
T02D1391:23b-18: dga' ba zhes pa ni dngos po thams cad la bde bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1391:23b-19: bde ba mi g-yo ba zhes pa ni /
T02D1391:23b-20: dngos po thams cad yang dag pa'i bde bar rig pa zhes pa ste /
T02D1391:23b-21: rnam pa lnga po des bsam gtan gyi yan lag tu brjod //
T02D1391:23b-22: de nas srog dang rtsol ba zhes pa ni /
T02D1391:23b-23: rkyang ma dang ro ma g-yas dang g-yon pa'i lam 'gog pas /
T02D1391:23b-24: dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i'i lam du rtag tu rtsol ba rab tu 'jug pa'o //
T02D1391:23b-25: dbyung ba dang bum pa can dang /
T02D1391:23b-26: dgang ba'i sbyor bas bya ba 'di ni srog rtsol gyi yan lag tu brjod /
T02D1391:23b-27: de la 'dzin pa zhes pa ni /
T02D1391:23b-28: srog gis dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor rnams lte ba dang /
T02D1391:23b-32: gtsug tor du rab tu zhugs pas phyi rol du mi rgyu zhing /
T02D1391:23b-33: thig le la rlung rab tu thim pa 'di ni 'dzin pa'i yan lag tu bshad do //
T02D1391:23b-34: de la rjes su dran pa zhes pa ni /
T02D1391:23b-35: rtog dang bral zhing gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa can
T02D1391:23b-36: du rang gi yi dam gyi lha mthong ba de
T02D1391:23b-37: las 'od zer du ma 'phros te 'od kyi dkyil
T02D1391:23b-38: 'khor spros pa der khams gsum gyi gzugs kyi rnam
T02D1391:23b-39: pa du ma 'pho ba 'di ni rjes su dran
T02D1391:23b-40: pa'i yan lag tu bshad do //
T02D1391:23b-41: de nas ting nge 'dzin zhes pa ni /
T02D1391:23b-42: yi dam gyi lha rnams dang rjes su chags pa
T02D1391:23b-43: gang zhig las mi g-yo ba'i bde ba thob pa
T02D1391:24a-0: des sems kyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa @24a *
T02D1391:24a-2: gcig tu byed pa'i sems de ni ting nge 'dzin
T02D1391:24a-3: gyi yan lag tu de bzhin gshegs pas brjod de
T02D1391:24a-4: / 'dir ni sbyor ba'i yan lag drug bsdus nas bshad la /
T02D1391:24a-6: dang po'i sangs rgyas mchog dang bla ma'i man ngag las khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1391:24a-7: rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya chen po 'grub ces pa ni dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas nas gsungs pa /
T02D1391:24a-8: so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor yul rnams bral zhing ma lus sngags kyis lhag par gnas //
T02D1391:24a-9: mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur pa mi bdag
T02D1391:24a-10: bsam gtan sbyor bas rnam par dag / srog rtsol
T02D1391:24a-11: rnam par dag pas ri bong can nyid sbong la
T02D1391:24a-13: nyon mongs bdud sogs bsad nas stobs bcu dag la bsam gtan stobs kyis 'jug pa yin //
T02D1391:24a-14: yang dag 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ye shes gzugs brnyan dri med du yang rjes su dran par 'gyur //
T02D1391:24a-15: de phyir bsam gtan dag pas nyin mtshan 'ga' zhig gis ni ye shes lus nyid 'grub par byed //
T02D1391:24a-17: snyan dngags tshig gi bkod pa med //
T02D1391:24a-18: mu stegs kyis bshad ma yin tshad //
T02D1391:24a-19: kun mkhyen gsung gis bshad pas na //
T02D1391:24a-20: de phyir mkhas pas bzod par rigs //
T02D1391:24a-21: kha che'i pandi ta chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D1391:24a-22: pandi ta de nyid kyi drung du dpyal lo ts'a bas bsgyur pa'o /
T02D1391:24a-24: // / so sor sdud pa'i mtshan ma'i dbye ba rnam pa bcu ste /
T02D1391:24a-34: thig le mthong ba'i dbye bas ma brtags pa'i ye shes kyi phung po'o //
T02D1391:24a-35: rdo rje snying po'i 'grel pa nas /
T02D1391:24a-36: rgyal bas ma lus rgyud kyi nges don ston gyi drang ba'i don ni ma yin no //
T02D1391:24a-37: rtogs phyir gal te 'grel pas drang don gsal byed des don brdzun du gyur pa'o //
T02D1391:24a-39: nad gzhan yin zhing sman 'di gzhan te nad ni rab tu 'joms pa'i phyir du 'gyur ram ci //
T02D1391:24a-40: thub pa'i don la sogs rton rnam bzhir yin gyi gsal byed la sogs rton pa min //
T02D1391:24a-42: me long dang ni pra ti se na dang 'dra dus gsum yang dag rig byed 'di //
T02D1391:24b-0: dngos dang dngos @24b min rtog pa'i dra ba dang bral ye shes gang zhig gnyis med pa'o //
